vulnerabilities.title: Empty Credential Configuration in github
vulnerabilities.description: Server expects credential in GITHUB_TOKEN but none provided
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement proper credential validation and secure defaults

vulnerabilities.title: Hardcoded Credential in brave-search Configuration
vulnerabilities.description: Server configuration contains hardcoded credentials in environment variable BRAVE_API_KEY
vulnerabilities.impact: Credential exposure, unauthorized access to external services
vulnerabilities.exploitation_vector: Configuration file access or repository exposure
vulnerabilities.remediation: Use secure secret management system instead of hardcoded values

vulnerabilities.title: Empty Credential Configuration in slack
vulnerabilities.description: Server expects credential in SLACK_BOT_TOKEN but none provided
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement proper credential validation and secure defaults

vulnerabilities.title: BashGod Command Execution Without Proper Sandboxing
vulnerabilities.description: BashGod MCP server allows execution of arbitrary bash commands without proper sandboxing or input validation
vulnerabilities.impact: Complete system compromise, privilege escalation, data exfiltration
vulnerabilities.exploitation_vector: Malicious command injection through MCP protocol
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement command whitelisting, sandboxing, and strict input validation

vulnerabilities.title: BashGod Runs with User Privileges
vulnerabilities.description: BashGod server inherits user privileges allowing potential privilege escalation
vulnerabilities.impact: Unauthorized access to user files and system resources
vulnerabilities.remediation: Run BashGod in restricted container or with dedicated low-privilege user

vulnerabilities.title: MCP Protocol Lacks Transport Encryption
vulnerabilities.description: MCP server communications are not encrypted by default
vulnerabilities.impact: Message interception, credential theft, data tampering
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement TLS encryption for all MCP communications

vulnerabilities.title: Unencrypted Inter-Server Communication
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement TLS/SSL for all inter-server communication

vulnerabilities.title: Potential SSRF in github API Integration
vulnerabilities.description: API integration may be vulnerable to Server-Side Request Forgery
vulnerabilities.impact: Internal network access, metadata service exposure
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement URL validation and whitelist allowed hosts

vulnerabilities.title: Potential SSRF in github API Integration
vulnerabilities.description: API integration may be vulnerable to Server-Side Request Forgery
vulnerabilities.impact: Internal network access, metadata service exposure
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement URL validation and whitelist allowed hosts

vulnerabilities.title: Insufficient Input Validation Across MCP Servers
vulnerabilities.description: Many MCP servers lack comprehensive input validation
vulnerabilities.impact: Command injection, path traversal, data corruption
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement comprehensive input validation and sanitization

vulnerabilities.title: Limited DoS Protection for MCP Servers
vulnerabilities.description: MCP servers may lack comprehensive DoS protection
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement rate limiting, request throttling, and resource monitoring

vulnerabilities.title: Potential Log Injection Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Logging system may be vulnerable to log injection attacks

vulnerabilities.title: Vulnerable Dependency: PyYAML
vulnerabilities.description: Package PyYAML version 6.0.2 has known vulnerabilities: RCE vulnerabilities
vulnerabilities.impact: Various security vulnerabilities depending on package

vulnerabilities.title: Vulnerable Dependency: requests
vulnerabilities.description: Package requests version 2.32.3 has known vulnerabilities: Security vulnerabilities
vulnerabilities.impact: Various security vulnerabilities depending on package

vulnerabilities.title: MCP Protocol Lacks Transport Encryption
vulnerabilities.description: MCP server communications are not encrypted by default
vulnerabilities.impact: Message interception, credential theft, data tampering
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement TLS encryption for all MCP communications

vulnerabilities.title: Unencrypted Inter-Server Communication
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement TLS/SSL for all inter-server communication

recommendations: CRITICAL: Implement proper sandboxing for BashGod MCP server to prevent system compromise
HIGH: Enable TLS encryption for all MCP server communications
HIGH: Implement secure secrets management system for API keys and tokens
HIGH: Update all vulnerable dependencies to latest secure versions
MEDIUM: Implement comprehensive input validation and sanitization
MEDIUM: Add rate limiting and DoS protection to all MCP endpoints
MEDIUM: Implement network segmentation and firewall rules
LOW: Enhance logging security to prevent log injection attacks
LOW: Add comprehensive security monitoring and alerting
LOW: Implement incident response procedures for MCP security events
